iti34:2.1: “Anatapi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu anottapi abhabbo sambodhaya, abhabbo nibbanaya, abhabbo anuttarassa yogakkhemassa adhigamaya.
iti34:2.2: Atapi ca kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ottapi bhabbo sambodhaya, bhabbo nibbanaya, bhabbo anuttarassa yogakkhemassa adhigamaya”ti.
iti34:5.1: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavata, iti me sutanti.
